敷.definition: to spread; to lay out; to apply (powder, ointment etc); sufficient (to cover); enough

敷湯藥.definition: (coll.) to pay compensation for medical expenses

敷演.definition: variant of 敷衍; to elaborate (on a theme); to expound (the meaning of the classics)

敷衍.definition: to elaborate (on a theme); to expound (the classics); perfunctory; to skimp; to botch; to do sth half-heartedly or just for show; barely enough to get by

敷衍了事.definition: (idiom) to do things half-heartedly; to merely go through the motions

敷衍塞責.definition: (idiom) to skimp on the job; to work half-heartedly; not to take the job seriously

敷貼.definition: to smear; to apply glue or ointment to a surface

敷陳.definition: to give an orderly account; a thorough narrative
